tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE csr_progress (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    goal_name VARCHAR(255),
    current_progress INT,
    target_progress INT,
    deadline TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE csr_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  goal_id INT,
  progress DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (goal_id) REFERENCES csr_goals(goal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE csr_targets (
    target_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    target_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    goal_id INT NOT NULL,
    target_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    progress_value DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0,
    FOREIGN KEY (goal_id) REFERENCES csr_goals(goal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE csr_strategic_plan (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
);

CREATE TABLE corporate_social_responsibility_goals (
 goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 goal_description TEXT,
 target_date DATE,
 progress_status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE strategic_planning (
 plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 plan_description TEXT,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE progress_tracking (
 tracker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 goal_id INT,
 progress_description TEXT,
 progress_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE department_information (
 department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 department_name VARCHAR,
 department_head VARCHAR,
 location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE csr_goals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_name VARCHAR(255),
    target_value INT,
    progress_value INT,
    deadline_date DATE
);
